name: Deadman Reborn: Prologue
description:
Deadman Reborn: Prologue

- What is it?
So I was tryna make a silly l'il suttin' in time for Halloween (started end of September.). Wasn't able to finish it in time, but I tried. Was going to have a bigger story and multiple bosses, but unfortunately, I had to heavily downscope this into a short gauntlet of sorts.

Not gonna lie, There will be bugs, and I profusely apologize, but I do hope you have fun with it lol

- How long did it take to make?
dev time: ~2mnths

- How long did it take to make?
Around 20mins. Replayable tho...i think

- What do I do if I liked it?
Tip a guy, innit lol. Or just follow me on social media and come chat to man lol

you can read as few tweets about the making of this game here: https://twitter.com/i/events/1594777174862663691

- Any Tips?
ONLY TESTED WITH XBOX 360 CONTROLLER.

if the portal to the next floor appears immediately when level loads, please restart the level. you can ignore if you want to but yh....lol

when the level starts, press LB+RB within the first 6 seconds of it loading (before the title card fades) to unlock all bullets. a special sound will play ;)
